resources.string: * Emergency contact 2 and 3 are optional fields
Note: Please keep GPS ON \nwhen Protection mode is ON !
Shake the device up and down 3 times to send an SOS signal
Required for app to function in the background

Akira collects location data to enable \"tracking device\'s location\" even when the app is closed or not in use. Your location will only be shared with your own provided emergency contacts upon detection of emergency gesture. We NEVER store your location.

Akira requires this permission to access this device's location when the app is running in background or is not in use.
Your location will only be shared with your own provided emergency contacts upon detection of emergency gesture.
WE NEVER STORE YOUR LOCATION.

 Note: If tapping the below button does not open the permissions dialog, manually provide permission by going to app permission settings and selecting "Allow all the time" for location permisssion

The app requires SMS permission to enable \"sending SOS message to your selected emergency contacts\".\n\nPlease note that you may be charged by your network operator for sending SMS as per tariff plans in your area
This permission allows the app to run in background to be able to detect emergency gesture and send SOS signals when the app is not in use.
Select \"Allow all the time\" in Location Permissions

GPS must be enabled when Protection Mode is on to allow the app to access this device\'s location even when the app is closed or not in use. We NEVER store your location and only access your location when emergency gesture is detected. \nWe understand the sensitivity of these permissions and take best measures to protect your privacy.
HELP!\nThis SMS was sent from Akira app to you since you are an emergency contact in this user\'s contact list. Kindly call this contact soon.
Shake the device vertically 3 times to send SOS
Please provide atleast one emergency contact !
